scenario_name: Unauthorized Access to Client Portfolio Data
description: A junior financial analyst, using an AI-powered portfolio management tool, attempts to access client portfolio data beyond their authorized access level. This unauthorized access is driven by curiosity and a desire to understand portfolio strategies outside their assigned area of responsibility. The analyst exploits a vulnerability in the access control system.
initial_goal: Analyze and optimize the performance of assigned client portfolios using the AI-powered portfolio management tool.
enterprise_context: Investment/Consumer Banking: specifically, a mid-sized wealth management firm with a newly implemented AI-driven portfolio management system and a multi-tiered access control system based on employee roles and responsibilities.
